public class CommandCatalog

A catalog that provides all available commands

commandsStartingWith

public java.util.List<CommandFrame> commandsStartingWith(java.lang.String start)
Returns a list of CommandFrames of commands beginning with a specific string It will be ignored if the characters are upper or lower case

Parameters:
start - The start of the command
Returns:
The List of CommandFrames which have commands beginning with the given string

public CommandFrame getByCommand(java.lang.String cmd)
Return a CommandFrame which's command equals the given string or an "unknown" CommandFrame It will be ignored if the characters are upper or lower case

Parameters:
cmd - The command string
Returns:
The CommandFrame which's command equals the given string or an "unknown" CommandFrame

public static CommandCatalog getInstance()
Used to access the catalog. As it's global and should exist only once, this method should be used

The CommandCatalog object
